Tasks.taskDescription: Complete all exercises from chapter 5 including word problems and geometry practice, and revise multiplication concepts before the next math test.
Finish building the solar system model using foam balls, paint each planet accurately.
Write a detailed essay on 'My Favorite Book' explaining why you love the book, what you learned from it, and who your favorite character is.
Summarize key events of World War II, focusing on major battles, important leaders, and the impact of the war on different countries around the world.
Practice HTML and CSS lessons by creating a simple webpage that includes a heading, paragraph, image, and list to demonstrate basic coding skills.
Read chapter three of 'The Jungle Book' and write five important points about Mowgliâ€™s adventure and the challenges he faced in the jungle.
Label the continents and oceans on the provided map sheet, and answer all questions about landforms, climate zones, and natural resources mentioned in the chapter.
Revise all topics from the last three science classes, especially photosynthesis, energy flow in ecosystems, and the water cycle, for tomorrow's quiz.
Organize and clean your school bag by removing old papers, broken pencils, and other unnecessary items. Check each notebook for pending homework and insert timetable properly.
